channel.title: How to solve BigQuery Google Drive permission error?

item.title: How to solve BigQuery Google Drive permission error?
item.dc:creator: gjtang
item.description:
I solved… The problem was a service key permission problem.
I grant permission at bigquery and then it works

Read full topic
item.source: How to solve BigQuery Google Drive permission error?

item.title: How to solve BigQuery Google Drive permission error?
item.dc:creator: gjtang
item.description:
I add data from google storage (google sheet) and query from redash but it doesn’t work…
What should I do? Help me.

Error Message
Error running query: **b'{ "error": { "code": 403, "message": "Access Denied: BigQuery BigQuery: Permission denied while getting Drive credentials.", "errors": [ { "message": "Access Denied: BigQuery BigQuery: Permission denied while getting Drive credentials.", "domain": "global", "reason": "accessDenied" } ], "status": "PERMISSION_DENIED" } } '**

Read full topic
item.source: How to solve BigQuery Google Drive permission error?
